name: Simulate template matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.0.0-41aa1679f76e86c4a0b85f5df13df2e9f41a54e0 "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
